apps.author: simplex-chat
apps.name: SimpleX
apps.changeLog:
New in v6.3:

Better groups.
- Mention members and get notified when mentioned.
- Send private reports to moderators.
- Delete, block and change role for multiple members at once (Android and desktop only).
- Faster sending messages and faster deletion.

Better chat navigation
- Organize chats into lists to keep track of what's important.
- Jump to found and forwarded messages.

Better privacy and security.
- Private media file names.
- Message expiration in chats.

Read more on March 8: https://simplex.chat/blog/20250308-simplex-chat-v6-3-new-user-experience-safety-in-public-groups.html

- core: reduce simplexmq modules used in the client (#5368)

apps.author: cake-tech
apps.name: Monero.com
apps.changeLog:
## Release Notes

- Decred support
- Background synchronization for Monero
- UI enhancements
  - Swap flow updates
    - Allow coin control and fee selection in swaps
  - Send confirmation bottom sheet
    - Send confirmations are now handled in a new bottom sheet, with far better formatting of addresses and much more.
- Solana’s new implementation
   - Bug fixes and improvements across the board, as we're using a new Solana library that has been far better in our testing!
- XOSwap integration
  - [XOSwap](https://www.xoswap.com) is a new crypto <> crypto swap aggregator, and is now available to all Cake users by default.
- Remove Haven cryptocurrency support
- Bug fixes
  - Fixed an issue with progress reporting when restoring via QR code
  - Fixed issues with Trocador swaps making unnecessary API calls
  - Fixed an issue where transactions would not properly be cleared when switching wallets

## Hashes

apps.author: Gedsh
apps.name: InviZible
apps.changeLog:
* Updated DNSCrypt to version 2.1.8.
* Updated Tor to version 4.8.16.
* Updated Tor SnowFlake obfuscating proxy to version 2.11.0.
* Added an option to block LAN connections when using public Wi-Fi.
* Fixed display of archived apps on Android 15.
* Updated German, Persian and Spanish translations.
* Fixes and optimizations.

apps.author: mollyim
apps.name: Molly
apps.changeLog:
In this release, we've given Molly a fresh new look:

- New logo & launcher icons: The Molly logo and launcher icons have been redesigned to be cleaner and visually appealing.
- Updated color palette: We've refreshed the app's light and dark themes for a more vibrant and intuitive user experience.

We hope you like the new design!

For the complete list of changes, see the [CHANGELOG](https://github.com/mollyim/mollyim-android/wiki/Changelog).

apps.author: cake-tech
apps.name: Cake Wallet
apps.changeLog:
## Release Notes

- Decred support
- Background synchronization for Monero
- UI enhancements
  - Swap flow updates
    - Allow coin control and fee selection in swaps
  - Send confirmation bottom sheet
    - Send confirmations are now handled in a new bottom sheet, with far better formatting of addresses and much more.
- Solana’s new implementation
   - Bug fixes and improvements across the board, as we're using a new Solana library that has been far better in our testing!
- XOSwap integration
  - [XOSwap](https://www.xoswap.com) is a new crypto <> crypto swap aggregator, and is now available to all Cake users by default.
- Remove Haven cryptocurrency support
- Bug fixes
  - Fixed an issue with progress reporting when restoring via QR code
  - Fixed issues with Trocador swaps making unnecessary API calls
  - Fixed an issue where transactions would not properly be cleared when switching wallets

apps.author: FossifyOrg
apps.name: Calendar
apps.changeLog:
### Changes:

* Fixed issue with "Mark completed" notification button (#156)
* Fixed cut-off text in month view on some devices (#265)
* Fixed broken weekly repetition in some timezones (#408)
* Fixed "Mark completed" button color in black & white theme (#357)
* Fixed invisible attendee suggestions (#41)
* Added ability to export event colors in ICS files (#188)
* Added ability to quickly filter calendars on long press (#309)
* Added state-specific and optional holidays (#379, #413)
* Other minor bug fixes and improvements
* Added more translations

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/FossifyOrg/Calendar/compare/1.1.0...1.2.0

apps.author: teamnewpipe
apps.name: newpipe
apps.changeLog:
[:arrow_right: :arrow_right: :arrow_right: Read the blog post, which also contains information about the rewrite state and the team state :arrow_left: :arrow_left: :arrow_left:](https://newpipe.net/blog/pinned/announcement/newpipe-0.27.6-rewrite-team-states/)

This hotfix release **fixes various YouTube issues**:
- `IOS player response is not valid` which prevented any video from loading #11980 TeamNewPipe/NewPipeExtractor#1272
- HTTP 403 errors while playing videos (usually at minute 1:09) #11803 TeamNewPipe/NewPipeExtractor#1272
- Missing video streams at 720p 24-30FPS #11486 TeamNewPipe/NewPipeExtractor#1272
- *A few* age restricted videos are now playable again #11382 TeamNewPipe/NewPipeExtractor#1272 <sub>(but only a few, since there is no known reliable method to extract them)</sub>

> [!WARNING]  
> YouTube requests now require to run and pass Google's *web browsers integrity checks*, which NewPipe performs through the system **WebView**. Therefore, if your device does not have a working WebView implementation, NewPipe will have to fallback to other video extraction methods which might incur in HTTP 403 errors when playing.

### New
- [YouTube] Add support for poTokens #11955 TeamNewPipe/NewPipeExtractor#1272

### Improved

- Convert error report timestamps to ISO format #11887

### Fixed

- Fix caption sizes not being changed #11806
- Fix loading `StreamInfo` twice on first `VideoDetailFragment` opening #11959
- [Soundcloud] Remove unplayable DRM-protected streams and reduce network requests TeamNewPipe/NewPipeExtractor#1269
- `DownloaderImpl`: Auto-close resources and simplify headers setting #11969

### Translation / Localization
- Correct a typo in contribution guidelines #11784
- Add link to donation page on app drawer #11870 

### Development
- Fix image-minimizer on lines containing multiple images #11879

apps.author: florisboard
apps.name: FlorisBoard
apps.changeLog:
_Release applies to tracks_: `stable`  `preview`

## What's Changed

* Implement custom material you colors by @lm41 in https://github.com/florisboard/florisboard/pull/2750
* Update snygg dynamic color scheme on wallpaper change by @lm41 in https://github.com/florisboard/florisboard/pull/2778
* Add new screenshot generator by @lm41 in https://github.com/florisboard/florisboard/pull/2787
* Add support for switching the subtype on space bar long press by @lm41 in https://github.com/florisboard/florisboard/pull/2781
* Devanagari Script and Hindi Language Layout Added  by @npnpatidar in https://github.com/florisboard/florisboard/pull/2723
* Fix crash when opening clipboard history (#2720) by @lm41 in https://github.com/florisboard/florisboard/pull/2756
* Fix BottomSheetContent drawing behind system nav bar by @lm41 in https://github.com/florisboard/florisboard/pull/2757
* Fix switching back from voice ime (#2684) by @lm41 in https://github.com/florisboard/florisboard/pull/2759
* Fix text being rendered behind the top app bar by @lm41 and @patrickgold  in https://github.com/florisboard/florisboard/pull/2758
* Possible fixes for all keys invisible bug by @patrickgold in https://github.com/florisboard/florisboard/pull/2743
* Remove code duplication in setup screen by @lm41 in https://github.com/florisboard/florisboard/pull/2742

## New Contributors
* @npnpatidar made their first contribution in https://github.com/florisboard/florisboard/pull/2723

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/florisboard/florisboard/compare/v0.4.5...v0.4.6
